articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: Nearly one-third of adolescents do not feel safe at school - Phys.org
articles.description: A large international study found that on average 31.4% of adolescents reported feeling unsafe at school in 13 European and Asian countries. The result revealed inequality in securing a safe educational environment for students across countries.
